1.content: So who do you want to gain?
1.title: The 1st choice

11.content:
It had been years since the destruction of the D-Reaper, and life had become much simpler since then, at least for Renamon, the other Digimon...and well just about everyone. Tamers and Digimon alike had taken to a life of ease, and the whole lot of them were much more relaxed. Each day only brought the pairs closer to each other.

But despite this new closeness, it didn't amount to much. There were no longer any epic struggles that called for their expertese, and the days began to grow long and lazy. At least that's how it was for Renamon. Renamon had been thoroughly satisfied with her fighting, action packed life style; living an the edge really, become stronger. But it wasn't until recently that she had enjoyed the luxury of true relaxation.

In fact, many of the Digimon were now able to enjoy pleasure that normally they paid no heed to. One of these pleasures, was food. Food had always been pure neccisity to some, and unneccesary indulgence to others. Now however, most of the Digimon truely did experiance how wonderful food could really be.

Renamon knew this all to well, as often she found herself overindulging. Quite recently, Renamon had become aware that she was gaining a bit of weight. The slim vixen had developed the tiniest layer of flab that covered her entire body. Renamon let out a sigh, patting this new fat. With a second paw, she continued to polish off a burger she had just recently been given, thanks to Rika of course.

Although the thought of weight gain did cause Renamon some discomfort at first, she wasn't too worred. She thought for sure Rika would be quite displeased, but her trainer's reaction was quite the opposite. When Renamon first approached Rika, she laughed, and told Renamon it wasn't a problem, as long as she didn't find herself obese.

On that note, Renamon's thoughts turned to Guilmon. Now there was a real glutton she thought, smiling to herself. Takato couldn't help but indulge his friends heavy appetite, and Guilmon couldn't help but be a glutton. Because of this, Guilmon had grown to become quite fat, a large belly spilled out from underneath a pair of meaty breasts. But he was happy, and as long as it stayed that way, nobody took to much interest. Besides, it wasn't like they needed to be in shape for anything.

On that note however, Renamon remembered she was supposed to find Rika. Renamon was sitting alone in Rika's room, completly forgetting that Rika was waiting for her. You see, Rika had recently found a job. It wasn't anything too glamerous or anything, but currently, she was working at...
11.title: Getting a bit soft...

113.content:
As Renamon quickly and swiftly made her way over to the Theater she was undisturbed, the Theater was an ugly classic block-shaped building in the middle of an urban high-rise, with grey and reddish bricks on top of a attractive entrance, but as she walked in the room was beautiful, the majestic furnishings consisted of dark brown wood and red painted walls, the counter was a dark marble, smooth top supported by varnished wood, god knows how much this place must of costed to furnish.

As she scouted the room Rika was nowhere to be seen, as Renamon had come out here she whispered to herself; 'I might as well look for Rika.' As she strolled over to the counter a cashier stood there, she must of been 15 or 16, grinding up chewing gum whilst picking at her nails.
"Excuse me?" Rena asked "Do you know if anyone called Rika is working here?"

The girl looked up at the Digimon, and she replied; "If you're not going to spend any mony could you leave"

Shocked at the girl's rudeness, Renamon felt like growling, but she decided to stay calm and ask "Please, I just need to see Rika you se-."

"Buy something or leave Digimon, you're choice." The rude girl replied.

Renamon gritted her teeth and furrowed her brow, the girl obviously wasn't going to help, so....
113.title: The Movie Theatre

choices: Re-enter the theater, the girl is still there.
Re-enter the theater, Rika had replaced the other girl.
1131.content: ...She, reluctantly, leaves. As she left the air suddenly turned cold and drops of water dropped down from the sky, Renamon sighed "Just my luck." as the heavens opened up, Rena started to briskly stroll back to Rika's house with her arms wrapped around her slightly thicker torso, but as she walked away an object shone on the ground, stopping she closely inspected it, (I cannot remember the currency so I'll go with dollars, feel free to correct me.) $10 read on it's silvery surface, Renamon thought to herself 'Well, If I buy something the cashier might help me on Rika, plus I could get a ticket and get something to eat'. As she spun the coin(?) in her paw.
1131.title: ...She, reluctantly, leaves...

choices: When Reanmon gets home she looks in a mirror
When Renamon gets home she eats supper and go's to bed

As Renamon entered the thetere again she noticed Rika was standing at the counter. Rnamon Ran over to the counter and smiled Rika looed very very tired because she had fallen asleep on the conter. When she was leaving she felt really bloated from eating one large bag of popcorn and a medium one too. She was walking home when she noticed Rika a itle bit ahead she ran p behind her and startled her "RIKA! I went to the thetere but didnt see you how was your day?" Rika lookd at Renamon and replyed " Ummm Good?" "Whats wrong Rika?" Renamon asked "You look heavyier Renamon." She said "Oh dont worry its a couple extra" Renamon said a tad worryied they both smiled at each other.

11422.content: After she drank enough her tummy growled. Renamon placed her paws on his belly and looked around. She stood up and blinked. Her belly was much bigger than before she drink. She shrugged and turned around, wandering into the kitchen. Loads of sandwiches and other foods were laying on the table. Renamon thought that this is too much, nobody eat that lot, so she grabbed a large, filled sandwich, and took a small bit into it. It tasted wonderful, so she decided to keep on eating...
11422.title: Stops drinking and starts eating

115.content:
With the usual speed and swiftness Renamon was known for, she zipped over to the Matsuki's Bakery where she found Rika kneeding dough.
Rika looked up and said "hey Renamon, you came a little sooner than I expected. Why don't you wait in the back of the store with Guilmon while I finish a few things.?"
"O.K. Rika" Renamon said with the same smooth voice she always had before walking into the back room where the sound of scarfing and munching was quite emenent.

Guilmon had grown a little sence Renamon saw him last. He was munching on a large pile of stale bread sitting on his large arse. His white belly was spreading out a foot or two in front of him while the meaty breasts became even more meaty and hung heavily off the side. Guilmon's legs also thickened up considerably, creating a roll of fat on the floor, while the tail had thickened to what Renamon guessed, twice it's with, wagging side to side slowly, jiggling constantly.

"Hello Renamon" Guilmon said, struggling to get up, making his ponderious paunch wobble like barraly set jello.
"Hello Guilmon" Renamon said slightly disgusted at how Guilmon let himself go, but yet intrested. She walked by Guilmon and brushed up agenst his fat ladden belly and almost shivered in comfort felling how warm and squishy it was.
"Aparently there are a few good things about being... large" Renamon thought before asking "Guilmon, may I try some of that bread."
"I don't know" Guilmon said holding a loaf "it's kind of stale"
"But your eating it"
"I have gotten used to it" Guilmon said as he took a bite out of the loaf.

Renamon decided that if she didn't like it she could always work it off, and started eating the loafs of stale bread, not bothering herself by tasting it.

When Rika came to the back, Renamon had
115.title: Consumed

choices: Renamon tells Rika that she wants to gain weight, and Rika agrees to help
Renamon tells her that it is just her imagination
Renamon apologises and tells her that she doesn't know what is happening ether
1153.content: Rika was surprise to see that Renamon was 200 pounds heavier than before "Renamon what happened to you?" "Nothing, I just eat some of Guilmon's food and I got bigger." "Exactly how much food did you eat?" "About 100 full boxes." "Well, come on in. Lunch is ready, unless your full." Rika, Renamon and Guilmon sat down with the others to eat. When the food arrived they told Guilmon not to eat all of it like last time, but to everyone's surprise (especially Rika's) it was Renamon who eat all the food. Renamon's belly swelled up, it was the size of a beach ball. Rika apologises for Renamon and the two go home. When they get home Rika asked Renamon what was going on.
1153.title: Gained 200 pounds

11531.content:
Renamon stays silent for a few seconds, until she finally responds: "Well, its just that..." "What, its just that what?!" Rika ask getting impatient. Renamon: "Well, have you seen Guilmon lately?" Rika: "Yes, so?" Renamon: "Have you seen how large he has become?" Rika: "Yes, he has gain a lot of weight, and getting lazy, what's your point?" Renamon: "Well its just that, have you notice how happier he is now?" Rika: "What do you mean?" Renamon: "It's just that, ever sense Guilmon has become fat, he seems happier than he ever was before. I want to know how it feels to be fat, to feel the same happiness that Guilmon is feeling!" Rika: "Wow Renamon, I didn't know you wanted that, but if it make you happy, I won't stop you." Renamon: "Really?" Rika: "Yes, in fact I'll help you gain weight." Renamon: "Thank you Rika." The two of them hug.

The next morning Rika prepared Renamon a huge breakfast. "Wow, all of that just for me?!" "Yeah, enjoy." Renamon started eating, and eating, and eating. As Renamon eat, Rika would cook more food for Renamon. After 2 hours of eating, Rika had run out of things to cook, and Renamon had run out of things to eat. Renamon's belly was huge, swollen from all the food she eat. Renamon just rested on the floor massaging her enormous belly. Rika walk up to her and ask: "So, Renamon how do you feel?" Renamon's response was...
11531.title: Renamon tells Rika that she wants to gain weigh...

choices: "Sorry, but Guilmon ate it all already"
115311.content: "Sorry Renamon, but that was all the food in the house, there's nothing left". "But I want more food. Isn't there something left, anything at all?" "No, you ate everything. Maybe Takato and Guilmon have some food left" "Good idea, lets go get some food" Rika helps Renamon up and they head out. The two go to Takato's house. When they arrived, and asked for food, Takato said:
115311.title: "I'm still hungry."

11533.content:
"I don't know," Renamon muttered embarrassed, "I saw Guilmon enjoying the bread so I sampled some too and the next thing I knew I was really hungry. In fact... I still feel hungry..."
"Well please Renamon," Rika sighed, "Don't go binging on anymore food. You've already done a good deal of damage. It might take a month or two to work of that gut you've got now."
Rika poked Renamons belly for emphasis, but was surprised to find how soft her partner was. Shaking it of she turned towards the door. "I'm gonna go find Henry, maybe he can give us some answers. Just stay here and don't eat anything."
Renamon just nodded, but it seemed RIka had no sooner slammed the door than Renamon felt her stomach growl, desperate for food.
Renamon now had two options it seemed. She could stay in the house and eat out of the cabinets, but RIka was sure to know then. Or she could leave the house and get the food elsewhere and Rika might never know.

What should she do?
11533.title: Renamon's hunger...

115332.content: Renamon decided to leave in search of food. She sneaks over to the neighbor's house and starts eating every piece of food she can find. By the time she was done there was absolutely no food in that house. It was getting late, and Renamon had to get back home before Rika wakes up and discovers she left. Renamon got back just in time, when Rika woke up there was no evidence that Renamon left the house, Renamon was confident Rika would never find out about her midnight snack. "Good morning Rika" said Renamon with a smile on her face. But Rika just responded with a combination of disappointment and anger look on her face, which made Renamon nervous. "What?" asked Renamon with fear on her voice. "Did you sneak out of here last night?!" ask Rika with a demanding tone. "What?! Of course not!" responded Renamon while thinking how she find out. "Then why is your belly bigger than last night?!" asked Rika. It seems that while Renamon was worried about getting back home before Rika woke up so she doesn't find out about her midnight snack, she forgot that all that eating made her gain...

Renamon sat down expecting to be punished but when she sat the chair cracked and he quickly sat up. "Well Rika you cant stop me from doing what I like So...."

choices: Go out for one last hearty binge
12.content:
It hadn't even been that long, but Krystal was already starting to feel a tad bit lonely.

It had been three months since Krystal left, and it wasn't even for anything glamerous or anything. It was all just from a stupid fight. He didn't think she could make it on her own. He really didn't think her capable of anything, particularily flying. He thought she was dead weight, though still, unbearably sexy.

Krystal wasn't about to wait around just to be his show girl.

She sighed, thinking about it, but it managed to stall her from her current predicament. Clad in her usual skimpy outfit, Krystal had begun to put on a few since her departure from Fox. Her belly formed a soft mound of flesh that curved slightly over her panties. Her bust had swollen slightly and her limbs had gained new weight to them as well.

Krystal had become altogether chubby, and was definatly in no mood to try and stop it. Blinking her eyes a bit, she looked about her room with a tiny grin - remnants of food everywhere - all of it was packed tightly inside her swollen gut. She patted her stomach gently and let out a sudden belch.

Nothing truely made her happy like a nice binge, which of course however, had obvious sideffects of fatnes. Not that she altogether minded, but others certainly did.

I was a bit harder to find work ever since, as not many places wanted to show of her new flabby body. But pretty soon she would be dead broke.

"What to do, what to do..." she asked aloud, still stroking her taunt belly gently
12.title: Lonliness

122.content: Thinking about how fox thought that she was nothing but deadweight, and how she was running out of money, Krystal decides to try and find work ones again. After a lot of searching and a lot of failed attempts at finding work, Krystal is about ready to give up. The next day, Krystal finally finds three jobs that she could do, and that her weight problem couldn't mess it up. The only problem is that all three jobs have the same working hours, so she can only pick one of them, all three jobs pay the same, so it didn't matter which she pick. After some thinking Krystal decides to become...
122.title: Try and find work

1221.title: a taste tester

choices: Somewhere with a little more class
To hell with it, just steal some food!
123.content:
It was of no use. After attempting several job interviews, Krystal was reluctantly turned down. It was trying times for the blue vixen, and losing her vigor for work, Krystal once again turned to the one thing that made her happy: food.

It's true she didn't have much money, but that wasn't about to stop her today. She would steal it if she really had to. Stopping home to grab some cash and slipping into a tight fitting jacket (though due to her plump frame, had become even tighter), Krystal began to head out to fill the void in her heart and stomach.

Looking about, Krystal gave her eager belly a pat, and deciding on where to eat
123.title: Filling in the holes

choices: Tell him I'd love to join him
I'm afraid I'm going to decline
Would you please ask him who he is?
1232.content:
Looking at her meager dollars, Krystal waved off her poverty with the nod of the head;

"To hell with it" she said aloud. "If I'm gonna eat I'm going to eat good." With her mind set, Krystal set off to find nourishment. She knew just the place.

Corneria was home to some of the finest cuisine, and "The Flagship" was no exception. Slightly humorous and adequately corny, "The Flagship" was a restaurant designed to mock or perhaps acknowledge the fine world of pilots, mercenaries, and other space warriors in the plight of fine dining. Some may be taken aback by the theme of the place, but all together, "The Flagship" had some very good reps.

"Ahh how many?"

Blushing slightly, Krystal replied "Just one."

The host looked slightly surprised but thinking nothing of it, brought her to a cozy seat in the corner. The atmosphere was pleasant but the fake ships hanging from the ceiling reminded Krystal of Fox. She frowned to herself - perhaps this wasn't the right place. But it was too late and after being served a drink, Krystal looked over the menu.

Budget wise, this was place was going to eat her money very fast. She couldn't even afford some of the really spendy cuisine. This defiantly seemed like a bad idea.

But Krystal's stomach desired pure and expensive foods and that's just what she was going to get. Maybe she could pit-pocket somebody. She could ditch the bill. Or she could whoo somebody over...

Her thoughts were momentarily interrupted by the returning waiter and expecting him to take her order, Krystal opened her mouth to speak, but only to meet further interruption.

"Excuse me" said the dignified hare, "but it appears the man over there" and pointing across several tables to a darkened table, "\ would like to have a word, and if, the madam would allow, would like to buy you dinner."

Her surprise must have shown on her face, as the waiter began again:

"Shall I decline his offer?"

"No no," replied Krystal hastily. Raising his eyebrow slightly, the hare gave Krystal an almost snobbish look. Ignoring him, Krystal began to think. A free meal at such an expensive restaurant? There has to be a catch. It's just too easy! Then again, food is food, catch or not. But why dine with a complete stranger? Unless, I know the guy.

Her stomach growled as if on que. Waiting impatiently for her reply, Krystal began...
1232.title: The Flagship

12323.content:
"Could you please ask this man who he is?" The waiter gave her an impatient look, but forcing a polite bow, headed off. Krystal watched him leave, her curiosity growing and she had an disquieting sense of intuition - that this person was someone she knew. How could it not be? Though she did not she got a few looks every now and then, she certainly hadn't been asked to dinner by anyone...well, anyone other then Fox.

Fox. Just his name stirred unwanted feelings in her and Krystal suddenly became aware she was grinding her teeth disturbingly loud. Apparently a few others noticed as well, giving Krystal a few disrespectful looks. Quickly regaining her composure, Krystal pretended to cough, and drinking frantically from a glass of water, smiled as the she set the glass down. But before she had the chance to do anything else embarrassing, Krystal looked up to find the waiter standing patiently beside her table. He cleared his throat.

"Well?" said Krystal impatiently. The hare sighed as if it caused him great difficulty to express the man's reply,

"He says, he's an old friend." Krystal looked at the waiter as if expecting more, this thought was quickly put to rest as the hare added quickly, "And that is all." Krystal was at a loss again, and the waiter gave a look of great impatience. Krystal however had already decided to accept this man's offer; she was getting very, very hungry. Giving a nod to the waiter, she followed the impressive hare to the table. As the unlikely duo neared the table, Krystal began to get a tingling sense of paranoia, but waving off her nonsensical fear was startled to find the guest waiting for her at the table...
12323.title: Some familiar faces

Falco likes fat Krystal and asks her to go on a date with him

Krystal sat down and started to relax, seeing one of her old friends was just what she needed to help her feel less lonely. Falco quickly notice and says "Go ahead order whatever you want". Krystal quickly reacts and orders the five tastiest and most fattening foods on the menu. While they wait for their food to arrive, they start talking about their life after Krystal left Star Fox. After a few minutes their food arrives and Krystal digs right in. In 20 seconds Krystal has eaten 4 entire meals; her belly had increase three times in size. Before eating the last one they start to talk again...

Krystal smiles and then frowns "Falco what about Kat?" "Oh her i dumped her the day after you left she was SO skinny I mean she nothing but fur but you... You have much more." Krystal blushes "Well I guess i can do this again say hmmm the buffet near the old launch station around 10:00?" Falco looks up Yes anything for you i'll be there oh and here your wallet fell out of your pants and well i looked in and saw no money so here." He ahnds her a 100 cridets. " Thanks Falco!" and then they shake hands and leave.

choices: The Colonal does nothing of suspicion
The Colonal might not be as honest as he says he is
123232.content:
Krystal noticed a few things about this man right away. First off he was fat. Very fat. His body seemed to fit quite tightly into what appeared to be an old, worn out military outfit. The next thing she noticed was he was a lizard. Krystal was immediately reminded of General Scales. But her thoughts were not given the chance to wander to far, interrupted as they were by her new host.

"Names 'Colonal Claw'" said the jolly lizard, extending his hand to Krystal. The reluctant vixen managed a weak smile before shaking his hand.

"Well, at least that's what they used to call me back in my prime," the Colonal burst into a fit of merry laughter before continuing. "Real names Cray though, believe it or not."

Krystal was lost for words. Why would an underling of Scales want to invite her to dinner? His southern drawl was heavy, and his uniform was tattered. Who was this idiot? Sensing her confusion however, Claw continued.

"Now before you get any strange ideas, let me explain. I'm not here ta instigate ya. Think of it more as an apology."

"APOLOGY," Blurted Krystal, as if that was the biggest understatement she'd ever heard.

"Now now just listen. Here's the thing," Began Claw in a sudden serious tone, "I was never part of Scales little uprising ya see? Believe it or not, Sauria had it's own military system before he came along. That's why I told ya, I was Colonal. As soon as Scales took power, he named himself General and liquidated the powers of all other ranks. Don't you worry miss, I was against him from the start. Had me detained for a looong time."

Krystal relaxed a bit.

"But don't even bother about all that Sauria stuff. You have my apologies for that damned Scales, but lets just have ourselves a good time. My words don't mean much but hopefully the food will."

As if summoning a banquet, several waiters began to place a wide assortment of foods before the two guests. There was good reason this Colonal was so fat thought Krystal. It wasn't like her to freeload off somebody, especially not someone who could be a potential enemy. Yet sensing no threat, Krystal dug in wholeheartedly.

However, still true to her initial intuition, Krystal made sure to watch the lizard very carefully.
123232.title: Colonal Claw

125.content:
What options to choose from. These could be some options.

Option I: - Since it's a Halloween Week with Saturday being October 31 of that Halloween Week for Krystal with it being currently a Friday before the aforementioned week begins, she decides to stock up on some candies and other foods like that. She literally stocks on it all enough for it to be in and literally enough in tons to literally last for months. She also applies before then for a part-time job as a taste-tester for a combination-of-a-bakery-and-a-pizza-restaurant-and-a-diverse-foods-serving-joint -and-an-all-that-anyone-can-eat-buffet restaurant-serving-diverse-foods-type of restaurant place with inexpensive prices of the most inexpensive at that, despite having made a lot of money during her time with "The "Starfox" "Team"" with it being enough to make her one of the richest of individuals combined with the wealth she inherited from her parents that she had transferred into a "Lylat System "Banking" "Account"". After applying, she is interviewed and hired on the spot on the Saturday of the aforementioned week. This does lead to obvious effects, but Krystal doesn't care about them, though.

Option II: - Same as the last few parts of Option I, but without it being a Halloween Week.

Option III: - Krystal heads for a combination-of-a-bakery-and-a-pizza-restaurant-and-a-diverse-foods-serving-joint -and-an-all-that-anyone-can-eat-buffet restaurant-serving-diverse-foods-type of restaurant place with inexpensive prices of the most inexpensive at that to have a "binge-eating feast" that causes her to get really, really, really, really fat. Not that she cares, of course. She becomes so addicted to the foods served there, that after a few weeks, she becomes quite a patron.

Inside Rouge chowed down on the popcorn taking frequent breaks to slurp the soda and swallow her candy. By the end of the movie...

So she tried to go home so she could change and go out to get some excersise, but when she gets home, she feels something bad brewing in the pit of her stomach. 155332211.content:
Fifi La Fume's weight gain


This is a fanfiction abotut the skunk character from tiny toons, fifi la fume getting stuffed along with her friend babs bunny.i dont own tiny toon characters.all belong to warner brothers.

fifi la fume decides to go to a carnvial with some of her friends.she goes with shirley the loon,babs bunny,plucky duck and buster bunny.

babs bunny:wow,this place has lots of fun games.I wonder what to do first.

plucky duck:hey,look its a water gun game.buster, i challenge you.you dont have my skills

buster bunny:well see about that plucky. come on,lets go

babs bunny:boys.so immature.come on girls, lets see what other stuff you can do.

so babs, shirley and fifi walk around the carnival looking for fun games and activites,they come across a pie eating contest.

fifi:mmm, those pies look deliciious.entering zat contest looks yummy.

babs bunny:hey,i like pies.they have my favorate.blueberry.im entering the contest.how about you shirley.

shirley the loon:naw, i "like"see they have a fortune teller across from it.im gonna try that and see if shes as good as I am.

babs bunny:go on ahead shirley, so what about you fifi.do you wanna challenge me in the pie eating contest.

fifi:qui,i will challenge you babs.

so babs and fifi sign up for the contest.

female fox announcer:okay girls,whoever eats the most bluberry pies wins.he shoots off a gun in the air and the girls start to eat.

they eat and eat and eat.babs is in the lead with 5.fifi with 3

babs:so,fifi are ya full yet.

fifi:nope,i can eat 50 more.

babs:well lets see.

so they eat some more.babs eats 40 and fifi eats 39

babs:uhh,im getting kinda full.but i cant let that skunk win.so they eat and eat

babs eats about 50 and then suddenly stops

babs:ohhhh,im soo full.i cant eat any more"belches".she rubs her full round tummy thats making gurgling noises and she has an outie belly button.she looks about 6 months pregnant.her face lands in a pie exausted

fifi:i can still win.fifi forces herself to eat her 50th pie.ohhhh,OOOO thats enough.my belly is full.im going to burst.she moans and massages her bloated gut.it makes her look like a purple balloon.there is pie goo all over her face.

announcer:well,it looks like we have a tie.ya know what.i guess i can give you both the prize money.5 dollars for you honey.she gives fifi 5 dollars.she then gives babs 5 dollars.

babs:five dollars.thats the prize money.5 measly dollars.we ate like a 100 dollars worth of pies and she gives us 5 dollars each."hiccup". she looks at her belly.wow, ive made a pig out of myself.

fifi:"belch".me too,she gently pats her round stomach.well,at least we had fun.come on.lets go see what zee guys are doing.she gets up and waddles to find buster and plucky and babs waddles along with her.both of thier bellies are extremely full and you could hear food sloshing inside of them when they walked..

THE END
155332211.title: Oui (yes)

1553322121.content:
babs bunny weight gain


This is a fanfiction abotut the bunny character from tiny toons, babs bunny getting stuffed by her grandmother when she visits her..i dont own tiny toon characters.all belong to warner brothers.

babs bunny is at her house watching the tv show,fresh prince of bel air

babs bunny:hahaha,that carlton is such a dork.

bab's mother comes over and turns the tv off.

babs:hey mom i was watching that.

babs's mother:look babs, your grandmother called.she wants you to come visit her today.You havent seen her in awhile so I thought it would be nice to take you over.

Babs:mom, i really dont want to go.its boring over there.

bab's mother:you are going and that it final.she drags babs against her will and drives her to her grandmother's house.

bab's mother:have a good time honey

babs:well,here it goes.i hate going over here.she walks in the door.

Babs's grandmother:there you are honey,give your grandma a big kiss.she picks babs up and kisses her many times

babs:okay,thats enought grandma.

bab's grandmother:look at you honey.you must be starving.come over and let your grandma come and fix you something to eat.

babs:okay,she sits down at the dinner table.

babs; grandmother:try some of my carrot cake.its my special treat for you babsy

babs:alright carrot cake.she eats the whole cake very quickly and licks her lips afterwards.

babs grandmother:my, my,you sure were hungry sweetie.do you want any more?

babs:yes,please

babs' grandmother:such a nice girl with good manners.ill fix you another cake it about 10 minutes.after the cake is done, she brings it to babs

babs eats the next cake as quick as the last one.

babs' grandmother:wow,babs you must be full.

babs:naw,can i have another one granny

babs' grandmother:wow,this girl sure has a big appetite.she fixes another carrot cake and babs eats it quick but a little slower than before.she eats 30 more cakes afterwards.

babs:okay grandma,im really full.she pats her full swollen stomach and belches.its really huge and round.she looks very pregnant.uhhh,i feel like im gonna explode

grandmother:i can imagine, yuo really ate alot.you also must be tired

babs:i am. i think im gonna take a nap.she starts to walk upstairs

grandmother:honey, after eating that large meal,do you think you are able to walk upstairs?

babs:im fine,she waddles slowly upstairs her stomach sloshing and making gurgling noises.she then lets out a disgusting burp.she then lays down on the bed and shuts her eyes..

15533222222222222111.content: Let's be honest we all like boobs, whether we admit it or not.
15533222222222222111.title: Where We All Like It

155332222222222221111.content:
Allyson was a beautiful young country girl from Northern Indiana. Roughly 5 foot 6 and around 100-105 pounds. She often went around in a flannel shirt tied off at her belly button, a white straw hat resting atop her head, with chocolate brown hair gently blowing in the wind as she walked with a sexual hip sway.
One day while she was milking the cows, gently caressing the cow's utters with long, thin fingers, a loud bang could be heard on the distance. This spooked the cow into running away, accidental trampling the poor girl and knocking her unconscious.
Allyson awoke hours later with a serious migraine. Other than the migraine, Allyson felt different in... Other ways. For whatever reason, her bra felt tighte! Due to said uncomfortableness, our heroine saw no choice but to take her bra off, but something still felt off. Thinking that she needed to refresh herself and headed to the bathroom, and that's when she saw the change.
155332222222222221111.title: Indiana Girl

info.brief_description: A weight gain story involving some of my own, and many others favorite characters!
info.description:
1. On this story, it would be nice to have some well thought out additions; that is to say, a lot of plot as opposed to simply just weight gain.

2. Stay away from "GAINS 100000000 pounds!" Massive weight gain is okay at best, but at least make it make sense.

3. Vore: I'm not gonna say no vore but you don't have to include it either.
